trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when trying to access a drive or share that is not available.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试访问的驱动器或共享不可用时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException> class uses the HRESULT COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException>类使用 HRESULT COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be thrown when a Win32 ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND HRESULT error is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 遇到 Win32 ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND HRESULT 错误时，可能会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with its message string set to a system-supplied message and its HRESULT set to COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例，使其消息字符串设置为系统提供的消息，其 HRESULT 设置为 COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not find the specified directory."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性的新实例为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"找不到指定的目录。"

trans-unit.source: This message is localized based on the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息是根据当前系统区域性本地化的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性的新实例初始化为`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with the specified message string and the HRESULT set to COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的消息字符串和设置为 COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND 的 HRESULT 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 参数初始化新实例的 `message` 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new instance is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性的新实例初始化为`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象，包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination of the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象，包含有关所引发异常的源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的序列化和上下文信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DriveNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
